title: A helpful back-up
description:
Did you forget what crazy prefix you set again?
No worries, just do "<@247863665598922762> prefix", and your prefix problems will precipitate away!

(Yes, you can mention the bot as a prefix and everything will be ok.)

title: Shiprekt
description:
Do you not like what Chiaki thinks of you and your Senpai? Don't worry. Just change your avatar, or your username, and she might judge you differently.

(Be careful, if you and your potential Senpoi are rigged, she will never change her opinion of you.)
